name: Fairytale Encore
storyline: One day, a girl who carried the book “Wizard of Oz” arrived at the institute. She had a lively and pure personality like Dorothy, but she was suffering since her body was very weak and she could not move well. He couldn’t ignore her situation and unknowingly pretended to be her ‘three followers’. Although his actions made the depressed Dorothy happier, they also made her more delusional.
summary: This is the fandisc to Liar-soft’s mysterious fairy tale horror Fairytale Requiem, including a main story featuring new heroine Dorothy which takes place before the events of the original game, and three side stories for Odil/Odette, Rapunzel and Gerda. The isolated medical center “Paradise” treats those that are afflicted with ‘fairytale syndrome’, where they believe they are fairy tale characters. The young doctor Ikeno, formerly an aspiring fairy tale writer who had his dreams crushed, couldn’t keep up with the patients who acted out their fantasies as they wished.
